data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kashiwa.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kashima throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Yuji Takahashi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Yuji Takahashi, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Naoki Kawaguchi is the substitute for Kashiwa.
In the minute 13, Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 14, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Kashiwa, close to Kashima's area.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Kashima are coming forward and Katsuya Nagato gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashima.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, In Kashiwa Kashima drive forward through Everaldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium, Shunki Takahashi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 29, Kashiwa surge into the attack at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium but Hayato Nakamaâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 30, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 32, Ryuji Izumi (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kashima a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Richardson (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In the minute 39, Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a second substitution, with Sachiro Toshima replacing Matheus Savio.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kashiwa drive forward but Michael Olunga is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 42, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Kashima.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
At Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa's Sachiro Toshima gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 45, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Kashiwa's Shunki Takahashi has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Kashiwa make their third substitution with Masatoshi Mihara replacing Richardson.
Everaldo for Kashima drives towards goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 48, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima's Juan Alano misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa drives forward and Michael Olunga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Ryotaro Araki is replacing Juan Alano for the away team.
In the minute 54, Zago is making the team's second substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Shoma Doi replacing Itsuki Someno.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 56, Michael Olunga for the home team is judged to be offside.
Michael Olunga is on target to give Kashiwa a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Masatoshi Mihara.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 61, Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
The away team replace Leo Silva with Ayase Ueda.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Kei Koizumi with Yasushi Endo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Zago.
Everaldo (Kashima) strikes at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium but his header is cleared.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Michael Olunga of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Kento Misao equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 73, Sachiro Toshima (Kashiwa) gets a yellow card.
Kengo Kitazume is replacing Hidekazu Otani for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 75, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Everaldo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Ayase Ueda (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 76, Kashima pushes forward through Kento Misao, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 78, Kashima needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Kashiwa are pushing forward but Michael Olunga's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Zago is making the team's fifth substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Ryota Nagaki replacing Ryuji Izumi.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashiwa.
In the minute 84, Michael Olunga puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Kashima are coming forward and Everaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 86, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kashima's half.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
In the minute 88, Yoshiro Imamura awards Kashima a goal kick.
Goal! Shoma Doi levels the match at 2-2.
Great play from Katsuya Nagato to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Kashima's Shoma Doi scores with his head to give his side a 2-3 lead.
Yasushi Endo instrumental with a fine assist.
